headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Snap up an Executive Office and customize it to your exact specifications – you will save 50% on the brick and mortar and all its upgrades.

Visit the Weapons Workshop inside your Mobile Operations Center or Avenger to refill your MK II ammo, half off all week. Plus, there’s a range of vehicles on sale:

- Vapid Caracara – 30% off
- JoBuilt Phantom Wedge – 40% off
- Bravado Gauntlet Hellfire – 30% off
- HVY Menacer – 40% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
